page.title: 12ERSKINE BRIDGE
page.content:
WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT THE BRIDGE?
It's a{white elephant.}.....Old man
When maintenance work is being done the{dirt falls off; covering the cars, the{windows}and the{furniture}with a thick layer of{grime.}... A housewife
{Access}to the bridge from the village is very{difficult.}.....A young mother
If the{toll charges}were{abolished,} more people would use it. . A driver
When there's a{high wind}you think you'r going to fall off{you don't feel {safe.}................. A pedestrian
It looks upon the river Clyde like a mother looking down on her child...... A young girl
